010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * This thresholder implements the algorithm proposed by Ridler and Calvard (1978),
014 * T.W. Ridler, S. Calvard, Picture thresholding using an iterative selection method,
015 * IEEE Trans. System, Man and Cybernetics, SMC-8 (August 1978) 630-632.
016 * described in Glasbey/Horgan: "Image Analysis for the Biological Sciences" (Ch. 4).
017 * 
018 * Slow version using explicit recalculation of background and foreground means 
019 * in every iteration.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 * @version 2022/04/02
023 */
024public class IsodataThresholderSlow extends GlobalThresholder {
025        
026        
027        private int MAX_ITERATIONS = 100;
028        
029        public IsodataThresholderSlow() {
030                super();
031        }
032
033        @Override
034        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
035                int K = h.length;
036                int q = (int) mean(h, 0, K-1);  // start with the total mean
037                int q_;
038                
039                int i = 0;      // iteration counter
040                do {
041                        i++;
042                        int nB = count(h, 0, q);
043                        int nF = count(h, q+1, K-1);
044                        if (nB == 0 || nF == 0)
045                                return -1;
046                        double meanB = mean(h, 0, q);
047                        double meanF = mean(h, q+1, K-1);
048                        q_ = q;                         
049                        q = (int)((meanB + meanF)/2);
050                } while (q != q_ && i < MAX_ITERATIONS);
051                
052                return q;
053        }
054
055}
